00024    /*
00025    * Default constructor.
00026    */
00027    AtomStorage::AtomStorage()
00028     : atoms_(),
00029       atomSet_(),
00030       atomReservoir_(),
00031       ghosts_(),
00032       ghostSet_(),
00033       ghostReservoir_(),
00034       atomPtrs_(),
00035       newAtomPtr_(0),
00036       newGhostPtr_(0),
00037       atomCapacity_(0),
00038       ghostCapacity_(0),
00039       totalAtomCapacity_(0),
00040       locked_(false),
00041       isInitialized_(false)
00042    {}

00050    /*
00051    * Read parameters and allocate memory.
00052    */
00053    void AtomStorage::readParam(std::istream& in)
00054    {
00055       readBegin(in, "AtomStorage");
00056       read<int>(in, "atomCapacity", atomCapacity_);
00057       read<int>(in, "ghostCapacity", ghostCapacity_);
00058       read<int>(in, "totalAtomCapacity", totalAtomCapacity_);
00059       allocate();
00060       readEnd(in);
00061    }
00062 
00063    /*
00064    * Set parameters and allocate memory.
00065    */
00066    void AtomStorage::initialize(int atomCapacity, int ghostCapacity, 
00067       int totalAtomCapacity)
00068    {
00069       atomCapacity_ = atomCapacity;
00070       ghostCapacity_ = ghostCapacity;
00071       totalAtomCapacity_ = totalAtomCapacity;
00072       allocate();
00073    }
00074 
00078    void AtomStorage::allocate()
00079    {
00080       // Precondition
00081       if (isInitialized_) {
00082          UTIL_THROW("AtomStorage can only be initialized once");
00083       }
00084 
00085       atoms_.allocate(atomCapacity_);
00086       atomReservoir_.allocate(atomCapacity_);
00087       atomSet_.allocate(atoms_);
00088       int i;
00089       for (i = atomCapacity_ - 1; i >=0; --i) {
00090           atomReservoir_.push(atoms_[i]);
00091       }
00092 
00093       ghosts_.allocate(ghostCapacity_);
00094       ghostReservoir_.allocate(ghostCapacity_);
00095       ghostSet_.allocate(ghosts_);
00096       for (i = ghostCapacity_ - 1; i >=0; --i) {
00097           ghostReservoir_.push(ghosts_[i]);
00098       }
00099 
00100       atomPtrs_.allocate(totalAtomCapacity_);
00101       for (i = 0; i < totalAtomCapacity_; ++i) {
00102          atomPtrs_[i] = 0;
00103       }
00104 
00105       snapshot_.allocate(atomCapacity_);
00106 
00107       isInitialized_ = true;
00108    }
00109 
00110    // Local atom mutators
00111 
00112    /*
00113    * Returns address for a new local Atom.
00114    */ 
00115    Atom* AtomStorage::newAtomPtr()
00116    {
00117       // Preconditions
00118       if (newAtomPtr_ != 0) 
00119          UTIL_THROW("Unregistered newAtomPtr_ still active");
00120       if (locked_ ) 
00121          UTIL_THROW("AtomStorage is locked");
00122       if (ghostSet_.size() > 0)
00123          UTIL_THROW("Ghosts are not cleared");
00124 
00125       newAtomPtr_ = &atomReservoir_.pop();
00126       newAtomPtr_->clear();
00127       return newAtomPtr_;
00128    }
00129 
00130    /*
00131    * Register new local Atom in internal data structures.
00132    */ 
00133    void AtomStorage::addNewAtom()
00134    {
00135       if (newAtomPtr_ == 0) 
00136          UTIL_THROW("No active newAtomPtr_");
00137       if (locked_) 
00138          UTIL_THROW("AtomStorage is locked");
00139       int atomId = newAtomPtr_->id();
00140       if (atomId < 0 || atomId >= totalAtomCapacity_) {
00141          std::cout << "atomId = " << atomId << std::endl;
00142          UTIL_THROW("atomId is out of range");
00143       }
00144       if (atomPtrs_[atomId] != 0) {
00145          std::cout << "atomId       = " << atomId << std::endl;
00146          std::cout << "New Position = " << newAtomPtr_->position() 
00147                    << std::endl;
00148          std::cout << "Old Position = " << atomPtrs_[atomId]->position() 
00149                    << std::endl;
00150          UTIL_THROW("Atom with specified id is already present");
00151       }
00152 
00153       atomSet_.append(*newAtomPtr_);
00154       atomPtrs_[atomId] = newAtomPtr_;
00155       newAtomPtr_->setIsGhost(false);
00156       newAtomPtr_ = 0;
00157    }
00158 
00159    Atom* AtomStorage::addAtom(int id)
00160    {
00161       Atom* ptr = newAtomPtr();
00162       ptr->setId(id);
00163       addNewAtom();
00164       return ptr;
00165    }
00166 
00167    /*
00168    * Remove a specific local Atom.
00169    */
00170    void AtomStorage::removeAtom(Atom* atomPtr)
00171    {
00172       // Precondition
00173       int atomId = atomPtr->id();
00174       if (atomId < 0 || atomId >= totalAtomCapacity_) {
00175          std::cout << "atomId = " << atomId << std::endl;
00176          UTIL_THROW("atomId is out of range");
00177       }
00178       atomReservoir_.push(*atomPtr);
00179       atomSet_.remove(*atomPtr);
00180       atomPtrs_[atomId] = 0;
00181       atomPtr->setId(-1);
00182       atomPtr->setIsGhost(false);
00183    }

00187    /*
00188    * Return address for a new ghost Atom.
00189    */ 
00190    Atom* AtomStorage::newGhostPtr()
00191    {
00192       // Preconditions
00193       if (newGhostPtr_ != 0) 
00194          UTIL_THROW("Unregistered newGhostPtr_ still active");
00195       if (locked_ ) 
00196          UTIL_THROW("AtomStorage is locked");
00197       newGhostPtr_ = &ghostReservoir_.pop();
00198       newGhostPtr_->clear();
00199       return newGhostPtr_;
00200    }
00201 
00202    /*
00203    * Register new ghost Atom to internal data structures.
00204    */ 
00205    void AtomStorage::addNewGhost()
00206    {
00207       if (newGhostPtr_ == 0) 
00208          UTIL_THROW("No active newGhostPtr_");
00209       if (locked_) 
00210          UTIL_THROW("AtomStorage is locked");
00211       int atomId = newGhostPtr_->id();
00212       if (atomId < 0 || atomId >= totalAtomCapacity_) 
00213          UTIL_THROW("atomId is out of range");
00214       //if (atomPtrs_[atomId] != 0)
00215       //   UTIL_THROW("Atom with specified id is already present");
00216 
00217       ghostSet_.append(*newGhostPtr_);
00218       if (atomPtrs_[atomId] == 0) {
00219          atomPtrs_[atomId] = newGhostPtr_;
00220       }
00221       newGhostPtr_->setIsGhost(true);
00222       newGhostPtr_ = 0;
00223    }
00224 
00225    Atom* AtomStorage::addGhost(int id)
00226    {
00227       Atom* ptr = newGhostPtr();
00228       ptr->setId(id);
00229       addNewGhost();
00230       return ptr;
00231    }
00232 
00233    /*
00234    * Remove a specific ghost Atom.
00235    */
00236    void AtomStorage::removeGhost(Atom* atomPtr)
00237    {
00238       // Precondition
00239       if (locked_) 
00240          UTIL_THROW("AtomStorage is locked");
00241 
00242       ghostReservoir_.push(*atomPtr);
00243       ghostSet_.remove(*atomPtr);
00244       int atomId = atomPtr->id();
00245       if (atomPtrs_[atomId] == atomPtr) {
00246          atomPtrs_[atomId] = 0;
00247       }
00248       atomPtr->setId(-1);
00249    }
00250 
00251    /*
00252    * Remove a specific ghost Atom.
00253    */
00254    void AtomStorage::clearGhosts()
00255    {
00256       // Precondition
00257       if (locked_) 
00258          UTIL_THROW("AtomStorage is locked");
00259 
00260       Atom* atomPtr;
00261       int   atomId;
00262       while (ghostSet_.size() > 0) {
00263          atomPtr = &ghostSet_.pop();
00264          atomId = atomPtr->id();
00265          if (atomPtrs_[atomId] == atomPtr) { 
00266             atomPtrs_[atomId] = 0;
00267          }
00268          atomPtr->setId(-1);
00269          atomPtr->clear();
00270          ghostReservoir_.push(*atomPtr);
00271       }
00272 
00273       if (ghostSet_.size() != 0) {
00274          UTIL_THROW("Nonzero ghostSet size at end of clearGhosts");
00275       }
00276    }

00278    // Snapshot functions
00279 
00283    void AtomStorage::makeSnapshot()
00284    {
00285       AtomIterator iter;
00286       int i = 0;
00287       for (begin(iter); iter.notEnd(); ++iter) {
00288          snapshot_[i] = iter->position();
00289          ++i;
00290       }
00291       locked_ = true;
00292    }
00293 
00297    void AtomStorage::clearSnapshot()
00298    {  locked_ = false; }
00299 
00303    double AtomStorage::maxSqDisplacement()
00304    {
00305       Vector dr;
00306       double norm;
00307       double max = 0;
00308       AtomIterator iter;
00309       int i = 0;
00310       for (begin(iter); iter.notEnd(); ++iter) {
00311          dr.subtract(iter->position(), snapshot_[i]);
00312          norm = dr.square();
00313          if (norm > max) max = norm;
00314          ++i;
00315       }
00316       return max;
00317    }

00319    #ifdef UTIL_MPI
00320 
00321    /*
00322    * Determine whether an atom exchange and reneighboring is needed.
00323    */
00324    bool AtomStorage::needExchange(MPI::Intracomm& communicator, double skin) 
00325    {
00326       // Calculate maximum square displacment among along nodes
00327       double maxSqDisp = maxSqDisplacement(); // maximum on node
00328       double maxSqDispAll;                    // global maximum
00329       communicator.Reduce(&maxSqDisp, &maxSqDispAll, 1, 
00330                           MPI::DOUBLE, MPI::MAX, 0);
00331 
00332       // Decide on master node if maximum exceeds threshhold.
00333       int needed;
00334       if (communicator.Get_rank() == 0) {
00335          needed = 0;
00336          if (sqrt(maxSqDispAll) > 0.5*skin) {
00337             needed = 1; 
00338          }
00339       }
00340       communicator.Bcast(&needed, 1, MPI::INT, 0);
00341 
00342       return bool(needed);
00343    }
00344 
00345    #else
00346 
00347    bool AtomStorage::needExchange(double skin) 
00348    {
00349       int needed = 0;
00350       if (sqrt(maxSqDisplacement()) > 0.5*skin) {
00351          needed = 1; 
00352       }
00353       return bool(needed);
00354    }
00355 
00356    #endif

00390    /*
00391    * Check validity of this AtomStorage.
00392    *
00393    * Returns true if all is ok, or throws an Exception.
00394    */
00395    bool AtomStorage::isValid() const
00396    {
00397       
00398       if (nAtom() + atomReservoir_.size() != atomCapacity_) 
00399          UTIL_THROW("nAtom + reservoir size != local capacity"); 
00400 
00401       if (nGhost() + ghostReservoir_.size() != ghostCapacity_) 
00402          UTIL_THROW("nGhost + reservoir size != ghost capacity"); 
00403 
00404       // Check consistency of indexing in atomPtrs_.
00405       // For atomPtr_[i] != 0, does atomPtr_[i]->id() = i ?
00406       Atom* ptr;
00407       int   i, j;
00408       j = 0;
00409       for (i = 0; i < totalAtomCapacity_ ; ++i) {
00410          ptr = atomPtrs_[i];
00411          if (ptr != 0) {
00412             ++j;
00413             if (ptr->id() != i) {
00414                UTIL_THROW("ptr->id() != i"); 
00415             }
00416          }
00417       }
00418       // Feb. 2012: I don't remember why this test is commented out.
00419       // if (nGhost() + nAtom() != j) 
00420       //   UTIL_THROW("nGhost + nAtom != j"); 
00421 
00422       // Count local atoms on this processor.
00423       ConstAtomIterator localIter;
00424       j = 0;
00425       for (begin(localIter); localIter.notEnd(); ++localIter) {
00426          ++j;
00427          ptr = find(localIter->id());
00428          if (ptr == 0)
00429             UTIL_THROW("Unable to find local atom returned by iterator"); 
00430          if (ptr != localIter.get())
00431             UTIL_THROW("Inconsistent find(localIter->id()"); 
00432       }
00433       if (j != nAtom())
00434          UTIL_THROW("Number from localIterator != nAtom()"); 
00435 
00436       // Count ghost atoms
00437       ConstGhostIterator ghostIter;
00438       j = 0;
00439       for (begin(ghostIter); ghostIter.notEnd(); ++ghostIter) {
00440          ++j;
00441          ptr = find(ghostIter->id());
00442          if (ptr == 0)
00443             UTIL_THROW("find(ghostIter->id() == 0"); 
00444       }
00445       if (j != nGhost())
00446          UTIL_THROW("Number from ghostIterator != nGhost()"); 
00447 
00448       return true;
00449    }

00451    #ifdef UTIL_MPI
00452 
00455    void AtomStorage::computeNAtomTotal(MPI::Intracomm& communicator)
00456    {
00457       int nAtomLocal = nAtom();
00458       communicator.Reduce(&nAtomLocal, &nAtomTotal_, 1, 
00459                           MPI::INT, MPI::SUM, 0);
00460       if (communicator.Get_rank() !=0) {
00461          nAtomTotal_ = -1;
00462       }
00463    }
